main.p: Give your time to people, not corporations or entertainment. YOLO.
Own up to your mistakes. YOLO.
Break out of your comfort zone. YOLO.
Wake up early and go to bed early. YOLO.
If you don't like your life, change it. YOLO.
Don't bike at night without lights. YOLO.
Links that used to be in the video endscreen:

li.a: My Spiritual High is Higher Than Yours
